alert.note: Alert for Clackamas; Marion (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 4:59PM PDT until May 19 at 5:30PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Portland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Clackamas County in northwestern Oregon... Eastern Marion County in northwestern Oregon... * Until 530 PM PDT. * At 458 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over western Warm Springs Reservation, or 23 miles northeast of Detroit, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Clackamas and eastern Marion Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
